reviews.customers_say: Customers find the sweater soft, comfortable, and well-made, with vibrant colors and a lovely pattern.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great purchase-size seems to run a bit big
items.body: Great purchase. Decent quality sweater for the price, although pushing value at $35. Very comfortable and soft, with flattering fit IF you order the right size. For reference, I am 5â€™1â€, 135 pounds. I usually wear medium, ( larger chest),sometimes small. Amazon recommended M, but felt too big. I returned, and reorderd small. I prefer loose fit, comfortable clothing, but this just looked too big all around; sleeves too long, hem past hips, too much fabric around middle. Small fit much better, camouflaged, the â€˜around the middleâ€™ with enough space left over to be comfortable. If you like more of a loose, â€˜loose fitâ€™ you may want to go up a size but may run the risk of it looking, â€˜sloppy and too bigâ€™ vs. loose. Wearing small, â€˜blackâ€™ color in photo. I purchased black, brown, and apricot colors. Black is true black, brown is more of a pumpkin, and apricot is cream with a beige , very light peach undertone. Colors are attractive, and uniform throughout, print is cute. (Photo on light cream background to gauge colors).Great weight to wear alone ,(think sweatshirt weight), or layer in colder temps. Very versatile-looks great with jeans or leggings. It can go casual, or dressed up with some jewelry and slacks. Please note-If youâ€™re more of a low maintenance kind of gal, tag says to hand wash, line dry. Will update after washing. Overall happy with the purchase. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Go for the bold purchase
items.body: Great sweater. I took a bold step in getting this sweater. I love the pattern, but itâ€™s bold. It does run a bit bigger than you think so I suggest going down a size. It is so soft and comfortable. The material is not what I expected it was so comfortable. Especially on a rainy day. Itâ€™s heavy and not holey but not too heavy. It does keep you warmer in a cooler day. Go for the bold purchase you wonâ€™t regret it! Itâ€™s a perfect fall sweater Read more
items.author: Kevin

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Softest sweater ever!
items.body: I was on the fence about ordering this sweater because of the print, but Iâ€™m glad I gave it a chance because I absolutely love it! What I love most is that the sweater is just as soft on the inside as it is on the outside. Like butter! I ordered my normal size and itâ€™s nice and roomy without being too oversized. It also has amazing stretch so if you want a more form-fitted feel I would recommend sizing down. I have long arms and often have trouble with sleeves not being long enough, not the case with this sweater! I ordered the Apricot color and itâ€™s a nice golden beige with mustard colored flowers and hunter green leaves. The print is vibrant and darling and really makes this sweater unique. Order it, you wonâ€™t be disappointed! Read more
items.author: rockmama

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great pattern, not sure about the feel
items.body: I love the pattern, and the fabric is very soft. Itâ€™s not a sweater. Itâ€™s not a sweatshirt. Itâ€™s comfy, but the fabric does feel a little odd. Not scratchy at all, but artificial. I usually wear a large, but I sized down to a medium due to the reviews and it fits perfectly. The apricot color is exactly what I thought it would be from the picture. Read more
items.author: AP

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute and Cozy
items.body: This sweater is super cute! It's also pretty stretchy, and the fabric is really soft. It's a very comfortable sweater and a new favorite, I will be purchasing again in different colors ðŸ¤£ Read more
items.author: Elaine

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sweater
items.body: This sweater is absolutely beautiful. Great quality perfect fit. I ordered a small and 100% pleased with the fit. I will probably go back and order another sweater in a different print. Highly recommend. Read more
items.author: Kelsy Dagger

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very soft and good quality
items.body: Love this sweater! It is so soft and it is not too thin or too thick. I was pleasantly surprised by the quality. Read more
items.author: Christy

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars The fabric is amazing!!!
items.body: At first sight I was bit sure if I would like the sweater, but Iâ€™m glad I gave it a try. Iâ€™m in love with this sweater, the fabric is super soft and itâ€™s true to size. Size up if you like a looser fit. I receive a lot of compliments. Read more
items.author: Kelly Aponte

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Brown, Navy, Khaki, White, Apricot, Black, Green. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
